challenges.name: Health Crisis
challenges.description: You have fallen sick and the dragons have the only cure! Hurry and reach them, as you grow weaker with every hit
challenges.author: Ruiner

localizationDescription.English: You have fallen sick and the dragons have the only cure! Hurry and reach them, as you grow weaker with every hit
localizationDescription.简体中文: 小心！那些敌人的攻击比你想象的要厉害，受到那些攻击会永久变弱。

challenges.name: Iron Blood
challenges.description: The slightest touch could kill you. The journey will be long, but your condition allows you to survive even the most deadliest of scenarios.
challenges.author: Ruiner

localizationDescription.English: The slightest touch could kill you. The journey will be long, but your condition allows you to survive even the most deadliest of scenarios.
localizationDescription.简体中文: 敌人最微小的攻击都能杀害你，但是你却感化了危险的事件。你的这场旅程将会漫长而艰辛。

challenges.name: Trophy Collector
challenges.description: How many trophies can you collect?
challenges.author: Ruiner

localizationDescription.English: How many trophies can you collect?
localizationDescription.简体中文: 这个把所有遗物替换为奖杯的世界，正适合你这样的人。

challenges.name: Relic Specialist
challenges.description: You can no longer get any orbs
challenges.author: Ruiner

localizationDescription.English: You can no longer get any orbs
localizationDescription.简体中文: 这次没有了弹珠的供给，你能真正发挥遗物的力量吗？

challenges.name: Purist
challenges.description: You only have what you start with. How far can you go?
challenges.author: Ruiner

localizationDescription.English: You only have what you start with. How far can you go?
localizationDescription.简体中文: 你只有你开局获得的东西。你能走多远？

challenges.name: Enraged Enemies
challenges.description: Enemies deal more damage the more you hit them.
challenges.author: Coccolithophor#6083

localizationDescription.English: Enemies deal more damage the more you hit them.
localizationDescription.简体中文: 敌人在一次受到大量的伤害后，会增强自己的力量。

challenges.name: Time Trial I
challenges.description: You have 2 minutes and 30 seconds per battle. Can you survive?
challenges.author: Ruiner

localizationDescription.English: You have 2 minutes and 30 seconds per battle. Can you survive?
localizationDescription.简体中文: 每场战斗你只有两分半的时间。你能活下去吗？

challenges.name: Time Trial II
challenges.description: You have 25 minutes for all battles. Good luck!
challenges.author: Ruiner

localizationDescription.English: You have 25 minutes for all battles. Good luck!
localizationDescription.简体中文: 你一共只有25分钟打过所有战斗。祝你好运！

challenges.name: Time Trial III
challenges.description: You Have 2 minutes per battle and a total of 20 minutes for all battles. Only the speediest can complete this challenge
challenges.author: Ruiner

localizationDescription.English: You Have 2 minutes per battle and a total of 20 minutes for all battles. Only the speediest can complete this challenge
localizationDescription.简体中文: 你一共只有20分钟打过所有战斗，而且每场战斗只有2分钟。据说只有最快的哥布林才能通过试炼。

challenges.name: Pacifist
challenges.description: You are not allowed to kill. Destroy the board to show your dedication.
challenges.author: Ruiner

localizationDescription.English: You are not allowed to kill. Destroy the board to show your dedication.
localizationDescription.简体中文: 你不会攻击敌人，尝试摧毁板面中所有的钉子吧！
